comments:
Using our proprietary SCM, we tried to extract some J2EE projects from the repository. Random but frequent errors occur:

Caused by: org.eclipse.wst.common.frameworks.internal.SaveFailedException: !An_error_occurred_while_sa_ERROR_!

I have sent the testcase and more information to Chuck Bridgham. As far as we know, the problem only occurs when our product is based on WTP 1.0.2. Previous versions of WTP did not cause this issue.

Another validate edit problem with module core api

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 125738 ***
